text: But false prophets arose among the people, just as there will be false teachers among you. These false teachers will infiltrate your midst with destructive heresies, even to the point of denying the Master who bought them. As a result, they will bring swift destruction on themselves.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> will <st data-num="1811" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="766">debauched lifestyles</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">Because of</st> <st data-num="3739">these false teachers</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> of <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> will be <st data-num="987" class="">slandered</st>.<n id="3" />
And in their greed they will exploit you with deceptive words. Their condemnation pronounced long ago is not sitting idly by; their destruction is not asleep.
For if God did not spare the angels who sinned, but threw them into hell and locked them up in chains in utter darkness, to be kept until the judgment,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> if he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5339" class="">spare</st> the <st data-num="744" class="">ancient</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> did <st data-num="5442" class="">protect</st> <st data-num="3575" class="">Noah</st>, a <st data-num="2783" class="">herald</st> of <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>, <st data-num="3590">along with seven others</st>,<n id="1" /> when God<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1863" class="">brought</st> a <st data-num="2627" class="">flood</st> on an <st data-num="765" class="">ungodly</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> if he <st data-num="5077" class="">turned to ashes</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">cities</st> of <st data-num="4670" class="">Sodom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1116" class="">Gomorrah</st> when he <st data-num="2632" class="">condemned</st> them to <st data-num="2692" class="">destruction</st>,<n id="1" /> having <st data-num="5087" class="">appointed</st><n id="2" /> them to serve as an <st data-num="5262" class="">example</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="3195" class="">future generations</st> of the <st data-num="765" class="">ungodly</st>,<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> if he <st data-num="4506" class="">rescued</st> <st data-num="3091" class="">Lot</st>, a <st data-num="1342">righteous man</st> in <st data-num="2669" class="">anguish</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="766" class="">debauched</st> <st data-num="391" class="">lifestyle</st> of <st data-num="113">lawless<n id="1" /> men</st>,<n id="2" />

(<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> while he <st data-num="1460" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">after</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>, that <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous man</st> was <st data-num="928" class="">tormented</st> in his <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">soul</st><n id="1" /> by the <st data-num="459" class="">lawless</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> he <st data-num="990" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="189">heard</st><n id="2" />)

—if so,<n id="1" /> then the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knows</st> how to <st data-num="4506" class="">rescue</st> the <st data-num="2152" class="">godly</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> their <st data-num="3986" class="">trials</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="5083" class="">reserve</st> the <st data-num="94" class="">unrighteous</st> for <st data-num="2849" class="">punishment</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st>,

especially those who indulge their fleshly desires and who despise authority.

Brazen and insolent, they are not afraid to insult the glorious ones,

<st data-num="2699">yet even</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>, who <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3173">much more</st> <st data-num="2479 1411">powerful</st>,<n id="2" /> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">bring</st> a <st data-num="989" class="">slanderous</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> in the <st data-num="3844" class="">presence</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778">these men</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="249" class="">irrational</st> <st data-num="2226" class="">animals</st>—<st data-num="5446">creatures of instinct</st>, <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> be <st data-num="259" class="">caught</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5356" class="">destroyed</st><n id="3" />—do not <st data-num="50" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st><n id="4" /> they are <st data-num="987" class="">insulting</st>, and consequently<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5356" class="">destruction</st> they will be <st data-num="5351" class="">destroyed</st>,<n id="6" />

<st data-num="91" class="">suffering harm</st> as the <st data-num="3408" class="">wages</st> for their <st data-num="93" class="">harmful ways</st>.<n id="1" /> By <st data-num="2233" class="">considering</st> it a <st data-num="2237" class="">pleasure</st> to carouse <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5172" class="">broad</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">daylight</st>,<n id="2" /> they are <st data-num="4696" class="">stains</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3470" class="">blemishes</st>, <st data-num="1792" class="">indulging</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="539">deceitful pleasures</st> when they <st data-num="4910">feast together</st> with <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

Their <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3324">full</st> of <st data-num="3428" class="">adultery</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="180">never stop</st> <st data-num="266">sinning</st>;<n id="3" /> they <st data-num="1185" class="">entice</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="793" class="">unstable</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">people</st>.<n id="5" /> They have <st data-num="1128" class="">trained</st> their <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> for <st data-num="4124" class="">greed</st>, these <st data-num="2671">cursed</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>!<n id="6" />

By <st data-num="2641" class="">forsaking</st> the <st data-num="2117" class="">right</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">path</st> they have <st data-num="4105">gone astray</st>, because they <st data-num="1811" class="">followed</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> of <st data-num="903" class="">Balaam</st> son of <st data-num="1007" class="">Bosor</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> the <st data-num="3408" class="">wages</st> of <st data-num="93" class="">unrighteousness</st>,<n id="2" />
yet was rebuked for his own transgression (a dumb donkey, speaking with a human voice, restrained the prophet’s madness).
These men are waterless springs and mists driven by a storm, for whom the utter depths of darkness have been reserved.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> by <st data-num="5350" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="5246" class="">high-sounding</st> but <st data-num="3153">empty words</st><n id="1" /> they are able to <st data-num="1185" class="">entice</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">fleshly</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st> and with <st data-num="766" class="">debauchery</st>,<n id="3" /> people<n id="4" /> who have just <st data-num="668" class="">escaped</st><n id="5" /> from those who <st data-num="390" class="">reside</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4106" class="">error</st>.<n id="6" />

Although <st data-num="846" class="">these false teachers</st> <st data-num="1861" class="">promise</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846">such people</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1657" class="">freedom</st>, they themselves <st data-num="5225" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1402" class="">enslaved</st> to<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5356" class="">immorality</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whatever</st> a <st data-num="5100" class="">person</st> <st data-num="2274" class="">succumbs</st> to, to <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> he is <st data-num="1402" class="">enslaved</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> after they have <st data-num="668" class="">escaped</st> the <st data-num="3393" class="">filthy things</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="1922">rich knowledge</st> of <st data-num="1473">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="2" /> they<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> get <st data-num="1707" class="">entangled</st> in them and <st data-num="2274" class="">succumb</st> to them,<n id="4" /> their <st data-num="2078" class="">last state</st> has <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="5501" class="">worse</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> than their <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> it would have <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="2909" class="">better</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">never</st> to have <st data-num="1921" class="">known</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> of <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st>, having <st data-num="1921" class="">known</st> it, to <st data-num="5290">turn back</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> that had been <st data-num="3860" class="">delivered</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
They are illustrations of this true proverb: “A dog returns to its own vomit,” and “A sow, after washing herself, wallows in the mire.”
